@graph.name: Pokemon Palette Generator
@graph.description: A free web tool that extracts color palettes from Pokemon artwork, providing designers and artists with inspiration and exact color values for their projects.
@graph.softwareRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
@graph.releaseNotes: Free web-based Pokemon color palette generator

acceptedAnswer.text: Pokemon Palette Generator is a free web tool that extracts color palettes from Pokemon artwork, providing designers and artists with inspiration and exact color values for their projects.

mainEntity.name: How do I use the Pokemon Palette Generator?

acceptedAnswer.text: Simply select a Pokemon from the menu, and the tool will automatically extract and display the color palette with HEX, RGB, and HSL values that you can copy and use.

mainEntity.name: Is Pokemon Palette Generator free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Pokemon Palette Generator is completely free to use. No registration or payment required.
The Pokemon Palette Generator supports HEX, RGB, and HSL color formats, making it compatible with all major design tools and development environments.
The tool supports all Pokemon species from all generations, providing access to over 1000 different Pokemon color palettes.

@graph.name: How to Generate Pokemon Color Palettes
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to using Pokemon Palette Generator

step.name: Select a Pokemon
step.text: Choose your favorite Pokemon from the dropdown menu or search for a specific Pokemon.

step.name: View the Color Palette
step.text: The tool will automatically extract and display the Pokemon's color palette with multiple color blocks.

step.name: Copy Color Values
step.text: Click on any color block or use the format dropdown to copy HEX, RGB, or HSL values.

step.name: Use in Your Project
step.text: Paste the color values into your design software, code editor, or any creative project.
